    • addAttainment

      public void addAttainment(Attainment attainment)
      adds attainment object into hashmap and updates students credits. If an attainment with given name exists it updates the attainment
      Parameters:
      attainment - attainment object to be added

    • getCoursesDone

      public HashMap<String,Attainment> getCoursesDone()
      Returnds all students completed course
      Returns:
      return HashMap of all completed courses

    • setNewDegree

      public void setNewDegree(String newDegree)
      Sets new degree for student. Clears previous information about degree status
      Parameters:
      newDegree - name of the new degree as string

    • setNewOrientation

      public void setNewOrientation(String newOrientation)
      Sets new orientation for student. Clears previous information about degree status
      Parameters:
      newOrientation - name of the new orientation as string

    • hasAttainment

      public boolean hasAttainment(String name)
      Checks if student has an attainment with param name
      Parameters:
      name - name of the course
      Returns:
      true if it exist otherwise false

      public float calculateAverageGrade()

      Returns:

    • removeAttainment

      public void removeAttainment(String name)

      name - name of the course as string
